turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to file a claim. My car got dented in a parking lot and I have the police report. Where do I start?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can definitely help with that. To begin, please provide your policy number. You can also upload the police report and any photos you have of the damage through our online portal. You can find the portal link on our website under 'File a Claim'.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I found the portal. But the website is asking me about the 'estimated repair cost' and I have no idea. How am I supposed to know that before getting it fixed? This is so confusing!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. You're not expected to provide a precise estimate at this stage. You can either leave that field blank for now, or put a rough guess if you have one. Alternatively, you can submit the claim without filling that field and we can get a quote for you. We'll then follow up with you to determine the next steps based on the quote from an approved repair shop. Just let me know if you have any other questions!
